summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3524 for the improvement of Stewart Street, from the Alley east of 8th Avenue to Eastlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43603, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
